snippet.title: Entropy Survivors - 101 Trailer
snippet.description:
Entropy Survivors is a bullet hell roguelike where you simultaneously control a powerful mech and a sharpshooting space frog, featuring outrageously creative abilities and powerful weapon customization. Save the universe in single player or 2-4 player online co-op!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2602030/Entropy_Survivors/

Maneuver the gunslinging Froggie and mecha-samurai GERM to tackle waves of alien enemies on a journey to liberate worlds from the forces of Entropy.

 Mix and match cartoonish weapons and quirky abilities, from weaponized garbage trucks to bee-shooting guns. Create chain reactions of interplanetary proportions and eliminate pesky creatures mucking up the galaxy.

Hit the battlefield as one of eight classes. Heal allies as the Paladin or sneak through smokescreens as the Assassin. Concoct an unstoppable build to stay standing against wave after wave of enemies.

Choose from a plethora of extraterrestrial-eradicating weapons. Mow foes down with the wide-reaching Rocket Launcher, blast aliens into oblivion with the Order’s Flamecaster, surf over crowds of enemies with the Sliding Shield, and more!

Survive Entropy alone or recruit other survivors in up to 4-player online co-op. Harness the power of FRIENDSHIP while synergizing classes, builds, and weapon combinations.

Survive to the end of each round to face each other and fight for the coveted title of MVP. All’s fair in friendship and alien extermination!

Entropy Survivors will traverse the galaxy on PlayStation, Xbox, and PC via Steam on PC later this year for $9.99 USD, with language support for English, Chinese, Spanish, and Brazilian Portuguese.
